title: President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Plan Your Visit         The visitor center at President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home is located in a historic home adjacent to the Birthplace Home. NPS Photo.  The visitor center contains exhibits about President Clinton's childhood and family and a bookstore.  Guided tours of the Clinton Birthplace Home are offered every 30 minutes beginning at 9:00 am with the last tour leaving at 4:00 pm. For more information, call 870-777-4455. The visitor center's address is 412 Division Street, Hope, AR, 71801. The sites mailing address is 117 S. Hervey Street, Hope, AR, 71801.
